tasks.title: Minimum hosting requirements
tasks.explications: Make sure your hosting plan at least support the following setup. But you should make sure you fulfill the recommended setup. Note: Administrative tasks may consume much more memory!

explicationlist.explicationitem: Nginx or Apache with mod_rewrite module
Minimum 40MB memory allocated to PHP for a single sites (at least 64MB for multisite)
At least 60s PHP max execution time

tasks.title: Recommended hosting requirements
tasks.explications: Depending on your setup (theme / used plugins) you may consider the recommended setup.

explicationlist.explicationitem: MySQL 5.6 or greater OR MariaDB 10.0 or greater
Nginx or Apache with mod_rewrite module
64MB memory allocated to PHP for a single sites (128MB for multisite)
120s PHP max execution time for very complex sites and/or backend operations

tasks.title: HTML5 Semantic Elements
tasks.explications: HTML5 Semantic Elements are used appropriately (header, section, footer, main...).
